notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: T.N.L-C. and M.T.M. were responsible for design this study; V.H.F-L. and P.S.A. conceived and analyzed the data; L.M.T. was responsible for sequencing and analyzing the positive samples; P.R.U. and R.M.M.S.A. helped in the field collection and taxonomic identifications of the specimens; all authors cooperated in drafting the manuscript, providing critical input regarding the findings, as well as read and approved the final manuscript.
